channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Code posted on Review Board at: https://reviews.apache.org/r/22246/
Hey Ann Burgess can you attach the .mat file here?

.mat unit test file too large for JIRA, file is attached on Reviewboard here: https://reviews.apache.org/media/uploaded/files/2014/06/10/43092452-6890-42cc-8254-fcbb1c8e07c6__breidamerkurjokull_radar_profiles_2009.mat

Got Annie's patch integrated, and tested, works awesome! Also managed to fix the tika-bundle issue with Felix (simple 1 liner, but since I had to update Annie's matlab parser in the tika-bundle Felix magic, I went ahead and fixed it too as part of this patch). Here comes the commit!

• patch applied in r1601805. The test file associated with this commit is quite big - Ann Burgess you may want to try and find a smaller one. Thanks so much Annie!

Fix for TIKA-1327: New parser for Matlab .mat files contributed by Annie Burgess. (mattmann: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1601805)

Add in the Java code to go along with r1601805: TIKA-1327: Matlab parser from Annie Burgess. (mattmann: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1601807)

Currently, the parser only outputs plain text, without any xhtml elements around it. Might be good to switch that to wrapping the variables in paragraphs or lists before we consider this "done"
Nick agreed, I will re-open this until we get that part in there.
• get paragraphs and lists in the output first, then close.
Here is a patch off of r1609222 (current trunk). This has some style updates, uses actual xhtml tags, and updates the unit test to check for tags.
Updated the patch to make sure the issue in TIKA-1363 is fixed. Put test_mat_text.mat into the parsers test-documents folder.

Looks good Tyler! Lets get this committed.
